original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – Fuel prices have been revised with effect from midnight yesterday.
The price of a liter of octane 92 petrol has been increased by 10 rupees and its new price is 328 rupees.
The price of a liter of Octane 95 fuel has been reduced by 20 rupees.
The price of a liter of Lanka Super Diesel has been increased by 6 rupees and its new price is 346 rupees.
The price of a liter of kerosene has been reduced by 09 rupees and its new price is 236 rupees.
Sri Lanka cricketer Wanindu Hasaranga reprimanded for breach during World Cup Qualifier
CCPI based headline inflation records another sharp decline in June 2023
